scripts.docker-build: docker system prune -af;cp -vf ${HOME}/.npmrc server/.npmrc; cp -vf ${HOME}/.npmrc client/.npmrc; cp -vf ${HOME}/.npmrc export/.npmrc && docker-compose build --pull --parallel --force-rm ; rm -vf client/.npmrc && ./updateVersion.sh && ver=$(awk 'FNR <= 1' version) && docker tag ionrev/ir-template-server ionrev/ir-template-server:${ver} && docker tag ionrev/ir-template-client ionrev/ir-template-client:${ver} && docker tag ionrev/ir-template-lib ionrev/ir-template-lib:${ver} && docker push ionrev/ir-template-server && docker push ionrev/ir-template-client && docker push ionrev/ir-template-lib && git add . && git commit -m ${ver} && git push
scripts.docker:git: git add . && git commit -m ${ver} && git push
scripts.docker:deploy: npm run docker:prune && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:version && npm run docker:tag-server && npm run docker:tag-client && npm run docker:push-server && npm run docker:push-client && npm run docker:git
scripts.version:major: npm version major && npm version major --prefix ./server && npm version major --prefix ./client
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && npm version minor --prefix ./server && npm version minor --prefix ./client
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && npm version patch --prefix ./server && npm version patch --prefix ./client
scripts.release:prerelease: npm version prerelease && npm publish --tag pre
scripts.d-push: docker tag ionrev/ir-template-server ionrev/ir-template-server:${ver} && docker tag ionrev/ir-template-client ionrev/ir-template-client:${ver} && docker push ionrev/ir-template-server && docker push ionrev/ir-template-client
